text: The Brazen Armoured Beserker is Tribal Chieftain of the Aesling and devote follower of the God of Slaughter.

Driven by his devotion to Khorne, Hakka seeks to claim the skulls of his fallen foes as trophies of war. This skill grants bonuses to Hakka's leadership and combat effectiveness for each enemy unit he slays in battle.

Hakka commands the beasts of the Northern Wastes, bending them to his will and unleashing them upon his enemies. This skill allows for the recruitment of powerful monstrous units unique to the Aesling tribe
Hakka is tormented by visions placing him amidst slaughter and battle on what appears to be holy ground among those who worship Chaos..

As the undisputed leader of the Aesling, Hakka exerts his influence over neighboring tribes and factions, forging alliances or demanding tribute. This skill improves diplomatic relations and increases income from vassals and tributaries.

With a keen eye for plunder and strategic acumen, Hakka leads devastating raiding expeditions into enemy territory. This skill increases the effectiveness of raiding and pillaging actions, yielding greater spoils for the Aesling tribe.
in battle, Hakka channels the unbridled rage of Khorne, becoming a whirlwind of destruction on the battlefiel

Hakka fosters unity and cohesion within his tribe, ensuring that his warriors fight as one formidable force. This skill improves army replenishment rate and reduces attrition effects on Aesling armies.
Hakka's indomitable will and unwavering determination make him a formidable foe on the battlefield. This skill grants Hakka increased resistance to enemy debuffs and crowd control effects.
It seems somebodies hack'n slashing days are numbered..

Forged amidst the frigid chaos of Norsca, the Bloodreavers, twin axes once grasped by Hakka the Aesling, bear the malevolent runes of Khorne's favor. These savage blades, steeped in the lore of northern storms, anticipate the fury of a yet-unfought battle on Zanbaijin's ancient grounds. As Hakka's grim shadow looms, the Bloodreavers thirst for the blood of future adversaries, becoming the embodiment of the Aesling warlord's unrestrained might and the impending tempest that shall echo through the annals of Chaos.
A frenzied berserker by reputation, many foes fall to the whirlwind fury of Hakka's twin battle-axes, their skulls made to garland the Throne of Khorne.
Hakka wields his twin battle-axes with deadly precision, cleaving through armor and flesh alike.

Hakka the Aesling, Warrior King of the Aesling tribe, faces a dire threat in Throgg the Troll King and his monstrous horde. Determined to usurp the Aesling tribe, Throgg's vile ambitions plunge the Northern Wastes into chaos. Hakka, wielding his twin battle-axes, leads his warriors to confront this monstrous menace, knowing that the fate of his tribe hangs in the balance. As the clash of steel and roar of beasts echo across the frozen landscape, Hakka stands resolute, ready to unleash the fury of Khorne upon the encroaching darkness and preserve the honor of his tribe.
As defeat draws near Khorne's wrathful gaze invigorates the Aesling to unravel into a ravaging fury.
Dedicated to Khorne: May only devote himself to Khorne
Can send a tribute of [[img:icon_skulls]][[/img]]Skulls to the Blood God
Aesling marauders willingly dedicate themselves to their own true lord, the God of Slaughter, carnage incarnate - Khorne.
{{tr:khorne_spawned_armies}} will be spawned upon razing settlements for the Hound
Marauder mobs are awarded even greater mobility when riding their crude chariots of bone and wood, lashed together with the guts and sinew of the vanquished.
Mighty beasts of groaning iron and brass, taller than a man and possessed of a crushing mass.
